nodeList.description: The base necrotic damage dealt by Wandering Spirits is converted to poison damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to poison damage, but not increases to necrotic damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: 100% of the necrotic damage dealt by wandering spirits is converted to poison\n\nThis makes the damage of wandering spirits scale with your minions' increases to poison damage, but not with your minion's increases to necrotic damage.
